predicate.note: Frames file for 'stanch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: cause (blood) to stop seeping

example.name: the one example
example.text: Thrombinar, a drug used *trace* *trace* to stanch bleeding, was sold to Jones Medical Industries Inc., St. Louis.

roleset.note: Usually 'staunch'. Not that that's very common either.
